page.title: 05FARMS NEAR COATBRIDGE
page.content: Of the four farms{Drumpark,Aitkenhead {Drumpellier and Ellismuir}Drumpark is the largest. They are all{dairy farms though Drumpark sells some{beef. Drumpark has{Fresian cattle,}while Aitkenhead has{Ayrshire,and Fresian and a few beef cattle. Aitkenhead farm has{one bull}which was bought in a sale in England.They have{200 cattle}which are kept in {cubicles}in winter. Drumpark has{500 to 600 cattle}which are kept in a barn in winter. The farmer in Aitkenhead farm feeds the cattle on{barley and cake}when they are getting milked. Then they sell the{milk}to the{Milk Marketing {Board. Drumpark feed their cattle on a {special kind of grass,}and the cattle are fed by{an auto feeder}which takes three quarters of an hour.
